Core:PCProperties.Core:Property: X[S] \{You feel a slight \{pain\|twinge\|spasm\} on the right side of your abdomen.\|Your tongue goes immediately numb and pain builds in your stomach.\|It suddenly feels as if spiders are crawling all over your skin. Pain starts to knot in your stomach.\}
X[S] You slowly feel your muscles unclench, and the pain that had built up in your body recede.
X[S] \$(person) seems to have a little more color on \$(their) skin.
X[S] You feel a little better, but it is clear that you are not well.
X[S] \$(person) looks a little better, but not healthy.

(\{ "Denier, Sat Feb 11 12:43:07 2006", "Denier, Sat Feb 11 13:09:25 2006", "Denier, Sat Feb 11 14:24:37 2006", "Denier, Sat Feb 11 14:35:51 2006", "Denier, Sat Feb 11 15:12:28 2006", "Denier, Tue Feb 14 15:07:52 2006", "Denier, Tue Feb 14 15:31:48 2006", "Denier, Fri May 12 01:13:12 2006", "Testbody, Tue Jun 27 11:49:11 2006", "Testering, Tue Jun 27 12:00:58 2006", "Testbody, Tue Jun 27 13:15:16 2006", "Testering, Thu Jun 29 07:55:07 2006" \})
X[S] You feel worse than you did a moment ago. The pain in your abdomen increases.
X[S] \$(person)'s face takes on a new, fascinating shade of deathly-pale.
X[S] You \{spasm\|twitch\|wince\} in great pain. Something very bad is happening to your body. Something inside.

X[S] \{Your stomach muscles spasm \{suddenly\|convulsively\|painfully\}, and your skin suddenly feels \{clammy\|damp\}.\|Nausea grips you and it is hard to breathe.\|Your skin feels like it is being pierced by red-hot coals.\|Your stomach muscles feel like they are tied in knots.\|Your entire mouth has gone numb.\|Your skin feels like it is on fire.\|A sudden spasm of pain wracks your entire body like fire!\}

X[S] \{You're beginning to feel \{somewhat\|a little\|a bit\|noticeably\} uncoordinated as the pain in your \{gut\|stomach\|abdomen\} continues to \{build\|grow\|intensify\}. Something is very wrong.\|Your sight is \{becoming\|growing\} blurred by the sweat running into your eyes, and the pain \{burning through\|searing\|wracking\} your torso.\|Each breath of your lungs is becoming a struggle as your body \{labors\|struggles\} for air, and your muscles spasm uncontrollably. You can still control yourself, but it feels like your time is running out.\|You experience the distinct sensation of flying or of feeling separated from your body.\}

X[S] \$(person) \{\{spasms\|twitches\|winces\} as if in \{great\|tremendous\|unbearable\} \{pain\|agony\|distress\}. Simultaneously, \$(their) \{complexion\|skin color\} is \{pale\|gray\|sickly\} and \{sweat\|perspiration\} covers \$(them).\|\{sweats\|perspires\} unnaturally.\|\{shakes\|twitches\|spasms\} in great agony.\|sways unsteadily on \$(their) feet.\|has an ashy complexion and seems nauseous.\|looks deathly ill.\|trembles and seems to be having trouble with the simplest coordinated movements.\|looks about ready to pass out.\|seems to have the shadow of death over \$(them).\}

Notes:Category.Notes:Note: * Painful, non lethal effect based on the the Aconite effect.
